entry.title: Saturday: Snow and blowing snow. High minus 10.
entry.summary: Increasing cloudiness. Snow and blowing snow beginning this morning. Amount 2 to 4 cm. Wind east 40 km/h gusting to 60. High minus 10. Wind chill minus 38 this morning and minus 21 this afternoon. Risk of frostbite. Forecast issued 3:00 AM MDT Saturday 8 April 2023

entry.title: Saturday night: Snow and blizzard. Low minus 12.
entry.summary: Snow and blowing snow. Near blizzard developing before morning. Snowfall amount 2 to 4 cm. Wind east 40 km/h gusting to 60. Low minus 12. Wind chill near minus 23. Forecast issued 3:00 AM MDT Saturday 8 April 2023
